page.title: 05ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {ENTERTAINMENT There is infrequent community entertainment .The Glass games were stopped two years ago through lack of competitors.Huntly does provide enough with Bingo and the swimming pool and Golf course but there is a limited mini_bus service into Huntly. { QUESTIONS Q.Do you think there is enough entertainment in Huntly for your children? A.I don't know,because there's no transport! Q.Do you think Huntly provides sufficent entertainment? A.Yes Q.So you have a car? A. Yes Q. Do you wish the Glass Games were continued? A.Yes,but there's nobody to run it!
